alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, Geneva, Houston, southwestern Henry and Coffee Counties in southeastern Alabama, Gulf and northern Walton Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida, Washington, Jackson, Bay, Calhoun, Holmes Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and western Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/... At 541 PM EDT/441 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Florala to 7 miles northwest of De Funiak Springs to 16 miles south of Geneva to 6 miles west of Bonifay to near Vernon to 16 miles south of Chipley to near Callaway to near Mexico Beach to 22 miles south of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Daleville, Elba, Cottonwood, Vernon, Bonifay, Geneva, Marianna, Headland, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Ozark, De Funiak Springs, Blountstown, Enterprise, Chipley, Graceville and Port St. Joe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; North Walton; Washington
